import React from "react"; import upcomingWorkoutsIcon from "../assets/icons/upcoming-workouts-dash.png"; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import { useState } from "react"; function UpcomingWorkouts(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

Upcoming Workouts

You have 2 upcoming workouts!
Tuesday, March 2nd

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Thursday, March 4th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Are you sure you want to cancel this workout?
); } export default UpcomingWorkouts;
